snippet: The Bowery Diner is set to open; the owners of No. 7 in Fort Greene will open a larger, more elaborate space than the original in Fort Greene; Pink Tea Cup closes.
abstract: Restaurants The Bowery Diner, No 7 Sub, Steak 'N Shake Signature, Talde, Anejo Tequieria Y Restaurante, King, Il Cantinori and Spring Natural Kitchen open in New York.
lead_paragraph: The Bowery Diner is set to open; the owners of No. 7 in Fort Greene will open a larger, more elaborate space than the original in Fort Greene; Pink Tea Cup closes.

headline.seo: Bowery Diner Opens, Pink Tea Cup Closes — Off the Menu
